summary: This document outlines the Universal Binary Harmonization Protocol (UBHP), a framework for a verifiable, regenerative, and self-sovereign future. It proposes a unified binary model, harmonic signatures, and verifiable provenance to ensure trust and integrity in digital information. The protocol is designed to facilitate a decentralized, open, and community-driven economy, where individuals can participate through efforts and utility tokens.
key_concepts: Regenerative Logistics Network (Resonance Rings in Action)
